reviews.review: Игра очень затягивает, интересна своим гейм плэем рекомендую поиграть.

Not really anything to do with this game. Although this game sucks. I just hate how stupid Steam can be sometimes. First giving me error messages when i try to add money to my account, Then just locking my account without email verification. So what your telling me is that even if a hacker or someone was using my account to add funds to it, that thats a bad thing? That doesnt sound like the money hungry steam i know. And steam if you see this, next time let me handle my own fucking problems first and if i need your guy's help i call.
its a fun game i dont recommend the free version there are just too many hackers
Ну значит помойка, но люблю, ну как бы пмоище, ну а с другой стороны как не играть?
this game is fun and allows you to be social and learn new skills to improve your game play.
ебаная помойка где читеров блять больше чем твоих друзей знакомых родных
Bardzo dobra gierka, pomimo wielu oszustów gra się w nią naprawdę spoko
love this game it is goooooooddddd
Full of bots. Would play again
the game is awsome you can play together with your friends and talk with other players in your team
Que es muy divertido juagar todo el dia con chetos me parece el mejor juego de hvh

a verdadeira experiencia competitiva em jogos FPS. o jogo pode parecer simples, mas contém uma profundidade de aperfeiçoamento absurda. todos que se envolvem, seja assistindo os campeonatos ou jogando com os amigos sempre buscam melhorar mais e mais, acredito que seja isso que mantém o jogo em alta até hoje.
Если у тебя нет нервных клеток то игра точно для тебя.
Its a fun competitive game. The only downside is toxicity.

Nie polecam grać na serwerach valve ani ze znajomymi, ani z losowymi osobami.Ciągle cheaterzy oraz toksyczni ludzie.Ten antycheat niby jest ale jednak go nie ma. Jeśli grać to tylko na faceit, dopóki valve nie zrobi coś z tą grą.Gra jest totalnie zaniedbana przez twórców  i zamiast polepszyć jakość gry, dodają tylko nowe skiny do kupienia. Według mnie gra umiera.
После игры в кс с ютуберами, вы станете звездой их ролика
Trust factor is a big dissapointment.
Пытался попасть в путина, попал в тюрьму

It's a very bad game experience. This game, where I played 400 hours, I started in 2016. I've seen Top Rank matches open up global rank tricks. he's always using a different experience with everyone. Why? valve can't stop this in a certain way? You're losing players, I'm thinking about quitting this Game 2 times again, you're losing loyal players.
